s: Oroton is synonymous with craftsmanship, accessible luxury, and a unique Australian sense of beauty. Founded in Sydney in 1938 by Boyd Lane, Oroton started as an importer of luxury European textiles. From its very beginnings, Oroton believed in quality, working to source the best materials ...

January 30, 2025 - In November 2017, Oroton announced it was entering into voluntary administration. In April 2018, the brand saw a significant increase in sales after Meghan Markle wore an Oroton crossbody bag for an official royal appearance with Prince Harry at London's Commonwealth Heads Of Government Meeting.
